title: Have some common tasks with other RNA-Seq pipelines
body:
Here's a few things that could be shared across our RNA-Seq pipelines:

 - fetching FASTQ data from GEO/SRA and ArrayExpress
 - building STAR index and various references
 - alignment
 - quality control

title: GATK uses an uncontrolled amout of CPUs
Integrate ASEReadCounter for alllele-specific expression analysis
Emit a BAM output when running HaplotypeCaller
body:
Many reads are being filtered in that step and the input BAM will not reflect the reads that were deemed good enough or informative for computing `AD`, `DP` and other statistics.

Reference: https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360037225632-HaplotypeCaller
